title: Don’t wait. Top Floor Studio in Central Richmond(494 27th Avenue#58)
posting_body: Large, fifth, top floor studio in Central Richmond.
Heat is steam.
Main room is sizeable.
Floors are hardwood except in bath.
Kitchen is around a corner, parallel to the main room.
It has space for a modest dining arrangement in front of the window.
5th, Top Floor Studio
* $915/month annual lease
* Shared laundry
* Parking available for an add'l fee
* pets ok
